name: Saladin
what_did:
Saladin was a Muslim leader who fought against the Crusaders.
He took back Jerusalem and was known for being fair, even to his enemies.
He united many Muslim lands under his rule.
why_matters:
Saladin became famous for his courage and kindness.
Even people who fought him respected him.
He showed that a leader can be brave and honorable.
